definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: I prefer to use debit card when shop on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 我通常喜欢用提款卡在网上购物。

sentences.english: You need to build a business, not to make new friends on-line.
sentences.chinese: 你需要建立一个生意，不结交新朋在网上。

sentences.english: And he has discovered many such grass-roots experts on douban. com.
sentences.chinese: 而且他在豆瓣网上已经找到了许多这样的草根专家。

sentences.english: In terms of the syllabus, it's going to be online.
sentences.chinese: 至于教学大纲，网上会有。

sentences.english: "Electronics are a lot easier to compare online, " Robertson said.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特森认为，“网上更容易比较电子产品的价格。
浏览网上自由译者布告栏。

sentences.english: Webcast of the take-off and landing will go live 5 minutes prior to each event.
sentences.chinese: 网上直播的起飞和降落会活5分钟前，每个事件。
考虑一下在网上租电影吧。

sentences.english: On-line order and signup for online trial.
sentences.chinese: 网上订单和注册为在线试用。

sentences.english: I found this on the web.
Trade on the net, most those who make a person afraid is con.
sentences.chinese: 网上交易，最让人担心的是欺诈。

sentences.english: Will you ever be able to make money on general-interest news on the Internet?
sentences.chinese: 你能从网上的新闻中赚到钱吗？

sentences.english: Online education gives students enough flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 网上教育使学生们获得了许多灵活性。

sentences.english: Welcome to the Hong Kong Diploma of Secondary Education (HKDSE) Examination Online Services.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎使用香港中学文凭考试网上服务。

sentences.english: Instead, they watch pirated DVDs or surf the Web.
sentences.chinese: 取而代之，他们看盗版光碟或者在网上冲浪。

sentences.english: Guru. com - The world's largest online marketplace for freelance talent.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最大的网上市场，为自由职业人才。

definition: to post (an item on a forum)
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
